title: 115: Enitan Bereola- Bestselling Author
description: Sal, Adam & Justin interview self-made man and bestselling author, Enitan O. Bereola II. With only a vision and dogged determination, Enitan has been able to write and take two books, Bereolaesque and Gentlewomen, to the bestsellers list. He now travels the world making appearances. His story is fascinating and inspiring and you can hear exclusively on MindPump. Buy his books on Amazon and can learn more at www.bereolaesque.com.
